title: be love
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, American, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Canadian
description: Opened Oct 2013, this vegetarian restaurant provides organic cuisine without wheat, gluten, dairy, additive or processed sugar. Offers a varied menu with both cooked as well raw food, fresh juices and exilirs. Vegan except for honey, pollen, egg. Simple, modern interior.
